Classes
Class
Description
AbstractDAO<T>
This class is an abstract data access object (DAO) that provides common functionality for interacting with a database.
clients
The clients class represents a client in the system.
ConnectionFactory
The ConnectionFactory class provides methods for creating and managing database connections.

The Control class represents the controller in the MVC architecture.

The MainView class is the entry point for the application.
